General.Name: Burelle SA
General.Description: Burelle SA, through its subsidiaries, offers automotive equipment, intelligent body systems, and clean energy systems and modules in France and internationally. The company offers plastic and composite body parts and systems, and fuel and pollution control systems; researches and develops lightweight vehicles, pollution control systems, and support for new engines; and develops, assembles, and provides logistics for automotive front-end modules. It also operates a venture capital company that invests in various companies through a network of family offices, investment funds, and financial institutions; and owns an office building in Levallois, as well as various real estate assets in the Lyon region. Burelle SA was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Lyon, France.
